title: FPS Drops
body: Hey guys, just recently (as in two or so days ago), I've had terrible FPS drops. I had around 100-200 FPS two days ago, but today and yesterday I get 30, and 10 in teamfights. Has anyone else experienced these drops? I'm thinking it has to do with the project minions, but im not sure. Thanks!

replies.body: A drop in FPS can happen for a few reasons like corrupt game files, hardware problems, or even outdated drivers.  We can rule out these possibilities through our [FPS guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)!  Go through the instructions provided there, and it should help get you fixed up.  Let me know if you run into any problems!
